text: avarkal (atil) tarippattirunta (kalat)tai allahve nankarintavan; vanankalilum pumiyilum maraivay iruppavai avanukke uriyanavakum; avarrai avane nanraka parppavan; telivayk ketpavan - avanaiyanri avarkalukku utavi ceyvor evarumillai, avan tannutaiya atikarattil veru evaraiyum kuttakkik kolvatumillai" enru (napiye!) Nir kurum
